fieldData.title: Setting of a maximum profit margin for health related products and services
fieldData.descriptionBackgroundInfo: The Ministry of Development and Investment announced the setting of a maximum profit margin in businesses selling products or providing services needed for the health as well as for nutrition, transportation and security of consumers. The measure in in force until 28 February, 2021 with a possibility of further extension.
fieldData.descriptionContentOfMeasure: The Ministry of Development & Investment announced, Friday 27 November 2020 that, by virtue of art. 21, LA 20.03.2020 as amended by art. 28, L.4753/2020 a new amendment will be submitted in the next few days by which it will be empowered to be able to set maximum final prices, on goods and services, necessary to ensure the public health and the financial interests of the citizens. As such the amendment will provide for the maximum final charge rates for COVID-19 testing to each private service provider. The prices are as follows: * As a maximum charge for the RT-PCR molecular test for the detection of the COVID-19, €40,00.* As a maximum charge for the rapid test for coronary antigen detection COVID-19 (Rapid test),€10.00.
fieldData.descriptionUseOfMeasure: The measure applies to all citizens.
